description:
This is probably one of my favorite LoRAs that I've ever made. Trained on 25 images generated with DALLE3 and Mr.ChatGPT's help. The LoRA loves making things spooky with a lot of mist, scary eyes, and undead features. Lower the strength if you don't want things overwhelmingly undead...but works perfectly with max strength otherwise. :)

This LoRA was trained on SDXL FaeTastic 2.0, I can't guarantee the best use with other SDXL checkpoints.

I have been having great success training SDXL LoRAs following these guidelines

Please don't upload my resources on third-party websites, if I wanted them there I would upload them myself.

Feel free to always message me on Discord (you can find me in the official Civitai discord) for any questions regarding Civitai, Stable Diffusion, or any of my resources!
